00075 // Utility methods
00076 
00077 template <typename IntegerT, typename FloatT>
00078 inline IntegerT
00079 floatingPointToFixedPoint(const FloatT s)
00080 {
00081     BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(boost::is_unsigned<IntegerT>::value);
00082     if (FloatT(0.0) > s) return std::numeric_limits<IntegerT>::min();
00083     else if (FloatT(1.0) <= s) return std::numeric_limits<IntegerT>::max();
00084     return IntegerT(std::floor(s * FloatT(std::numeric_limits<IntegerT>::max())));
00085 }
00086 
00087 
00088 template <typename FloatT, typename IntegerT>
00089 inline FloatT
00090 fixedPointToFloatingPoint(const IntegerT s)
00091 {
00092     BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(boost::is_unsigned<IntegerT>::value);
00093     return FloatT(s) / FloatT((std::numeric_limits<IntegerT>::max()));
00094 }
00095 
00096 
00097 template <typename IntegerVectorT, typename FloatT>
00098 inline IntegerVectorT
00099 floatingPointToFixedPoint(const math::Vec3<FloatT>& v)
00100 {
00101     return IntegerVectorT(
00102         floatingPointToFixedPoint<typename IntegerVectorT::ValueType>(v.x()),
00103         floatingPointToFixedPoint<typename IntegerVectorT::ValueType>(v.y()),
00104         floatingPointToFixedPoint<typename IntegerVectorT::ValueType>(v.z()));
00105 }
00106 
00107 template <typename FloatVectorT, typename IntegerT>
00108 inline FloatVectorT
00109 fixedPointToFloatingPoint(const math::Vec3<IntegerT>& v)
00110 {
00111     return FloatVectorT(
00112         fixedPointToFloatingPoint<typename FloatVectorT::ValueType>(v.x()),
00113         fixedPointToFloatingPoint<typename FloatVectorT::ValueType>(v.y()),
00114         fixedPointToFloatingPoint<typename FloatVectorT::ValueType>(v.z()));
00115 }

00122 template<typename StorageType_>
00123 struct NullAttributeCodec
00124 {
00125     typedef StorageType_ StorageType;
00126     template<typename ValueType> static void decode(const StorageType&, ValueType&);
00127     template<typename ValueType> static void encode(const StorageType&, ValueType&);
00128     static const char* name() { return "null"; }
00129 };

00155 class AttributeArray
00156 {
00157 protected:
00158     struct AccessorBase;
00159     template <typename T> struct Accessor;
00160 
00161     typedef boost::shared_ptr<AccessorBase>             AccessorBasePtr;
00162 
00163 public:
00164     typedef boost::shared_ptr<AttributeArray>           Ptr;
00165     typedef boost::shared_ptr<const AttributeArray>     ConstPtr;
00166 
00167     template <typename> friend class AttributeHandle;
00168 
00169     typedef Ptr (*FactoryMethod)(size_t);
00170 
00171     AttributeArray() : mCompressedBytes(0), mFlags(0) {}
00172     virtual ~AttributeArray() {}
00173 
00175     virtual AttributeArray::Ptr copy() const = 0;
00176 
00178     virtual AttributeArray::Ptr copyUncompressed() const = 0;
00179 
00181     virtual size_t size() const = 0;
00182 
00184     virtual size_t memUsage() const = 0;
00185 
00187     static Ptr create(const NamePair& type, size_t length);
00189     static bool isRegistered(const NamePair& type);
00191     static void clearRegistry();
00192 
00194     virtual const NamePair& type() const = 0;
00196     template<typename AttributeArrayType>
00197     bool isType() const { return this->type() == AttributeArrayType::attributeType(); }
00198 
00200     virtual void set(const Index n, const AttributeArray& sourceArray, const Index sourceIndex) = 0;
00201 
00203     virtual bool isUniform() const = 0;
00206     virtual void expand(bool fill = true) = 0;
00208     virtual void collapse() = 0;
00209 
00211     bool isCompressed() const { return mCompressedBytes != 0; }
00213     virtual bool compress() = 0;
00215     virtual bool decompress() = 0;
00216 
00221     void setHidden(bool state);
00223     bool isHidden() const { return bool(mFlags & HIDDEN); }
00224 
00228     void setTransient(bool state);
00230     bool isTransient() const { return bool(mFlags & TRANSIENT); }
00231 
00233     virtual void read(std::istream&) = 0;
00235     virtual void write(std::ostream&) const = 0;
00236 
00240     bool operator==(const AttributeArray& other) const;
00241     bool operator!=(const AttributeArray& other) const { return !this->operator==(other); }
00242 
00243 private:
00246     virtual bool isEqual(const AttributeArray& other) const = 0;
00247 
00248 protected:
00250     virtual AccessorBasePtr getAccessor() const = 0;
00251 
00253     static void registerType(const NamePair& type, FactoryMethod);
00255     static void unregisterType(const NamePair& type);
00256 
00257     enum { TRANSIENT = 0x1, HIDDEN = 0x2 };
00258     size_t mCompressedBytes;
00259     uint16_t mFlags;
00260 }; // class AttributeArray

00294     typedef boost::shared_ptr<const TypedAttributeArray>    ConstPtr;

00417 public:
00418     AttributeHandle(const AttributeArray& array, const bool preserveCompression = true);
00419 
00420     T get(Index n) const;
00421 
00422 protected:
00423     const AttributeArray* mArray;
00424 
00425     GetterPtr mGetter;
00426     SetterPtr mSetter;
00427 
00428 private:
00429     // local copy of AttributeArray (to preserve compression)
00430     AttributeArray::Ptr mLocalArray;
00431 }; // class AttributeHandle

00457 template<typename StorageType_>
00458 template<typename ValueType>
00459 inline void
00460 NullAttributeCodec<StorageType_>::decode(const StorageType& data, ValueType& val)
00461 {
00462     val = static_cast<ValueType>(data);
00463 }
00464 
00465 
00466 template<typename StorageType_>
00467 template<typename ValueType>
00468 inline void
00469 NullAttributeCodec<StorageType_>::encode(const StorageType& val, ValueType& data)
00470 {
00471     data = static_cast<StorageType>(val);
00472 }
00473 
00474 
00475 template<typename IntType>
00476 template<typename ValueType>
00477 inline void
00478 FixedPointAttributeCodec<IntType>::decode(const StorageType& data, ValueType& val)
00479 {
00480     val = fixedPointToFloatingPoint<ValueType>(data);
00481 
00482     // shift value range to be -0.5 => 0.5 (as this is most commonly used for position)
00483 
00484     val -= ValueType(0.5);
00485 }
00486 
00487 
00488 template<typename IntType>
00489 template<typename ValueType>
00490 inline void
00491 FixedPointAttributeCodec<IntType>::encode(const ValueType& val, StorageType& data)
00492 {
00493     // shift value range to be -0.5 => 0.5 (as this is most commonly used for position)
00494 
00495     const ValueType newVal = val + ValueType(0.5);
00496 
00497     data = floatingPointToFixedPoint<StorageType>(newVal);
00498 }
00499 
00500 
00501 template<typename T>
00502 inline void
00503 UnitVecAttributeCodec::decode(const StorageType& data, math::Vec3<T>& val)
00504 {
00505     val = math::QuantizedUnitVec::unpack(data);
00506 }
00507 
00508 
00509 template<typename T>
00510 inline void
00511 UnitVecAttributeCodec::encode(const math::Vec3<T>& val, StorageType& data)
00512 {
00513     data = math::QuantizedUnitVec::pack(val);
00514 }

00519 // TypedAttributeArray implementation
00520 
00521 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00522 tbb::atomic<const NamePair*> TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::sTypeName;
00523 
00524 
00525 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00526 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::TypedAttributeArray(
00527     size_t n, const ValueType& uniformValue)
00528     : AttributeArray()
00529     , mData(new StorageType[1])
00530     , mSize(n)
00531     , mIsUniform(true)
00532     , mMutex()
00533 {
00534     mSize = std::max(size_t(1), mSize);
00535     Codec::encode(uniformValue, mData[0]);
00536 }
00537 
00538 
00539 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00540 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::TypedAttributeArray(const TypedAttributeArray& rhs, const bool decompress)
00541     : AttributeArray(rhs)
00542     , mData(NULL)
00543     , mSize(rhs.mSize)
00544     , mIsUniform(rhs.mIsUniform)
00545     , mMutex()
00546 {
00547     if (mIsUniform) {
00548         mData = new StorageType[1];
00549         mData[0] = rhs.mData[0];
00550     } else if (mCompressedBytes != 0 && decompress) {
00551         this->decompress(rhs.mData);
00552     } else if (mCompressedBytes != 0) {
00553         char* buffer = new char[mCompressedBytes];
00554         memcpy(buffer, rhs.mData, mCompressedBytes);
00555         mData = reinterpret_cast<StorageType*>(buffer);
00556     } else {
00557         mData = new StorageType[mSize];
00558         memcpy(mData, rhs.mData, mSize * sizeof(StorageType));
00559     }
00560 }
00561 
00562 
00563 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00564 typename TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::TypedAttributeArray&
00565 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::operator=(const TypedAttributeArray& rhs)
00566 {
00567     if (&rhs != this) {
00568         this->deallocate();
00569 
00570         mFlags= rhs.mFlags;
00571         mCompressedBytes = rhs.mCompressedBytes;
00572         mSize = rhs.mSize;
00573         mIsUniform = rhs.mIsUniform;
00574 
00575         if (mIsUniform) {
00576             mData = new StorageType[1];
00577             mData[0] = rhs.mData[0];
00578         } else if (mCompressedBytes != 0) {
00579             char* buffer = new char[mCompressedBytes];
00580             memcpy(buffer, rhs.mData, mCompressedBytes);
00581             mData = reinterpret_cast<StorageType*>(buffer);
00582         } else {
00583             mData = new StorageType[mSize];
00584             memcpy(mData, rhs.mData, mSize * sizeof(StorageType));
00585         }
00586     }
00587 }
00588 
00589 
00590 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00591 inline const NamePair&
00592 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::attributeType()
00593 {
00594     if (sTypeName == NULL) {
00595         std::ostringstream ostr1, ostr2;
00596         ostr1 << typeNameAsString<ValueType>();
00597         ostr2 << Codec::name() << "_" << typeNameAsString<StorageType>();
00598         NamePair* s = new NamePair(ostr1.str(), ostr2.str());
00599         if (sTypeName.compare_and_swap(s, NULL) != NULL) delete s;
00600     }
00601     return *sTypeName;
00602 }

00652 
00653 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00654 size_t
00655 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::arrayMemUsage() const
00656 {
00657     return mCompressedBytes != 0 ? mCompressedBytes :
00658         (mIsUniform ? sizeof(StorageType) : (mSize * sizeof(StorageType)));
00659 }
00660 
00661 
00662 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00663 void
00664 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::allocate(bool fill)
00665 {
00666     tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock lock(mMutex);
00667 
00668     StorageType val = mIsUniform ? mData[0] : zeroVal<StorageType>();
00669 
00670     if (mData) {
00671         delete[] mData;
00672         mData = NULL;
00673     }
00674 
00675     mCompressedBytes = 0;
00676     mIsUniform = false;
00677 
00678     mData = new StorageType[mSize];
00679     if (fill) {
00680         for (size_t i = 0; i < mSize; ++i) mData[i] = val;
00681     }
00682 }
00683 
00684 
00685 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00686 void
00687 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::deallocate()
00688 {
00689     if (mData) {
00690         delete[] mData;
00691         mData = NULL;
00692     }
00693 }
00694 
00695 
00696 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00697 size_t
00698 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::memUsage() const
00699 {
00700     return sizeof(*this) + (mData != NULL ? this->arrayMemUsage() : 0);
00701 }
00702 
00703 
00704 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00705 typename TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::ValueType
00706 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::get(Index n) const
00707 {
00708     if (mCompressedBytes != 0) const_cast<TypedAttributeArray*>(this)->decompress();
00709     if (mIsUniform) n = 0;
00710 
00711     ValueType val;
00712     Codec::decode(/*in=*/mData[n], /*out=*/val);
00713     return val;
00714 }
00715 
00716 
00717 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00718 template<typename T>
00719 void
00720 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::get(Index n, T& val) const
00721 {
00722     if (mCompressedBytes != 0) const_cast<TypedAttributeArray*>(this)->decompress();
00723     if (mIsUniform) n = 0;
00724 
00725     ValueType tmp;
00726     Codec::decode(/*in=*/mData[n], /*out=*/tmp);
00727     val = static_cast<T>(tmp);
00728 }
00729 
00730 
00731 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00732 typename TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::ValueType
00733 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::get(const AttributeArray* array, const Index n)
00734 {
00735     return static_cast<const TypedAttributeArray<ValueType, Codec>*>(array)->get(n);
00736 }
00737 
00738 
00739 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00740 void
00741 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::set(Index n, const ValueType& val)
00742 {
00743     if (mCompressedBytes != 0) this->decompress();
00744     if (mIsUniform) this->allocate();
00745 
00746     Codec::encode(/*in=*/val, /*out=*/mData[n]);
00747 }
00748 
00749 
00750 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00751 template<typename T>
00752 void
00753 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::set(Index n, const T& val)
00754 {
00755     const ValueType tmp = static_cast<ValueType>(val);
00756 
00757     if (mCompressedBytes != 0) this->decompress();
00758     if (mIsUniform) this->allocate();
00759 
00760     Codec::encode(/*in=*/tmp, /*out=*/mData[n]);
00761 }
00762 
00763 
00764 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00765 void
00766 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::set(Index n, const AttributeArray& sourceArray, const Index sourceIndex)
00767 {
00768     const TypedAttributeArray& sourceTypedArray = static_cast<const TypedAttributeArray&>(sourceArray);
00769 
00770     ValueType sourceValue;
00771     sourceTypedArray.get(sourceIndex, sourceValue);
00772 
00773     this->set(n, sourceValue);
00774 }
00775

00780 {
00781     static_cast<TypedAttributeArray<ValueType, Codec>*>(array)->set(n, value);
00782 }

00785 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00786 void
00787 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::collapse()
00788 {
00789     this->collapse(zeroVal<ValueType>());
00790 }
00791 
00792 
00793 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00794 void
00795 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::collapse(const ValueType& uniformValue)
00796 {
00797     if (!mIsUniform) {
00798         this->deallocate();
00799         mData = new StorageType[1];
00800         mIsUniform = true;
00801     }
00802     Codec::encode(uniformValue, mData[0]);
00803 }
00804 
00805 
00806 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00807 void
00808 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::expand(bool fill)
00809 {
00810     this->allocate(fill);
00811 }
00812 
00813 
00814 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00815 inline bool
00816 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::compress()
00817 {
00818 #ifdef OPENVDB_USE_BLOSC
00819 
00820     tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock lock(mMutex);
00821 
00822     if (!mIsUniform && mCompressedBytes == 0) {
00823 
00824         const int inBytes = int(mSize * sizeof(StorageType));
00825         int bufBytes = inBytes + BLOSC_MAX_OVERHEAD;
00826         boost::scoped_array<char> outBuf(new char[bufBytes]);
00827 
00828         bufBytes = blosc_compress_ctx(
00829             /*clevel=*/9, // 0 (no compression) to 9 (maximum compression)
00830             /*doshuffle=*/true,
00831             /*typesize=*/1,
00832             /*srcsize=*/inBytes,
00833             /*src=*/mData,
00834             /*dest=*/outBuf.get(),
00835             /*destsize=*/bufBytes,
00836             BLOSC_LZ4_COMPNAME,
00837             /*blocksize=*/256,
00838             /*numthreads=*/1);
00839 
00840         if (bufBytes <= 0) {
00841             std::ostringstream ostr;
00842             ostr << "Blosc failed to compress " << inBytes << " byte" << (inBytes == 1 ? "" : "s");
00843             if (bufBytes < 0) ostr << " (internal error " << bufBytes << ")";
00844             OPENVDB_LOG_DEBUG(ostr.str());
00845             return false;
00846         }
00847 
00848         this->deallocate();
00849 
00850         char* outData = new char[bufBytes];
00851         std::memcpy(outData, outBuf.get(), size_t(bufBytes));
00852         mData = reinterpret_cast<StorageType*>(outData);
00853 
00854         mCompressedBytes = size_t(bufBytes);
00855         return true;
00856     }
00857 
00858 #else
00859     OPENVDB_LOG_DEBUG("Can't compress array data without the blosc library.");
00860 #endif
00861 
00862     return false;
00863 }
00864 
00865 
00866 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00867 inline bool
00868 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::decompress(const StorageType* compressedData)
00869 {
00870 #ifdef OPENVDB_USE_BLOSC
00871 
00872     size_t inBytes, compressedBytes, blockSize;
00873     blosc_cbuffer_sizes(compressedData, &inBytes, &compressedBytes, &blockSize);
00874 
00875     int bufBytes = inBytes + BLOSC_MAX_OVERHEAD;
00876     boost::scoped_array<char> outBuf(new char[bufBytes]);
00877 
00878     const int outBytes = blosc_decompress_ctx(
00879          /*src=*/compressedData, /*dest=*/outBuf.get(), bufBytes, /*numthreads=*/1);
00880 
00881     if (bufBytes < 1) {
00882         OPENVDB_LOG_DEBUG("blosc_decompress() returned error code " << bufBytes);
00883         return false;
00884     }
00885 
00886     if (mData) delete[] mData;
00887 
00888     char* outData = new char[outBytes];
00889     std::memcpy(outData, outBuf.get(), size_t(outBytes));
00890     mData = reinterpret_cast<StorageType*>(outData);
00891 
00892     mCompressedBytes = 0;
00893     return true;
00894 
00895 #else
00896 
00897     OPENVDB_THROW(RuntimeError, "Can't extract compressed data without the blosc library.");
00898 
00899 #endif
00900 }
00901 
00902 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00903 inline bool
00904 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::decompress()
00905 {
00906     tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock lock(mMutex);
00907 
00908     if (mCompressedBytes != 0) {
00909         return this->decompress(this->mData);
00910     }
00911 
00912     return false;
00913 }
00914 
00915 
00916 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00917 void
00918 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::read(std::istream& is)
00919 {
00920     // AttributeArray data
00921     Int16 flags = Int16(0);
00922     is.read(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&flags), sizeof(Int16));
00923     mFlags = flags;
00924 
00925     Index64 compressedBytes = Index64(0);
00926     is.read(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&compressedBytes), sizeof(Index64));
00927     mCompressedBytes = size_t(compressedBytes);
00928 
00929     // TypedAttributeArray data
00930     Int16 isUniform = Int16(0);
00931     is.read(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&isUniform), sizeof(Int16));
00932     mIsUniform = bool(isUniform);
00933 
00934     Index64 arrayLength = Index64(0);
00935     is.read(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&arrayLength), sizeof(Index64));
00936     mSize = size_t(arrayLength);
00937 
00938     this->deallocate();
00939     const size_t bufferSize = this->arrayMemUsage();
00940 
00941     char* buffer = new char[bufferSize];
00942     is.read(buffer, bufferSize);
00943     mData = reinterpret_cast<StorageType*>(buffer);
00944 }
00945 
00946 
00947 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00948 void
00949 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::write(std::ostream& os) const
00950 {
00951     if (!this->isTransient()) {
00952 
00953         // AttributeArray data
00954         os.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&mFlags), sizeof(Int16));
00955 
00956         Index64 compressedBytes = Index64(mCompressedBytes);
00957         os.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&compressedBytes), sizeof(Index64));
00958 
00959         // TypedAttributeArray data
00960         Int16 isUniform = Int16(mIsUniform);
00961         os.write(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&isUniform), sizeof(Int16));
00962 
00963         Index64 arrayLength = Index64(mSize);
00964         os.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&arrayLength), sizeof(Index64));
00965 
00966         os.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(mData), this->arrayMemUsage());
00967 
00968     }
00969 }
00970 
00971 
00972 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00973 AttributeArray::AccessorBasePtr
00974 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::getAccessor() const
00975 {
00976     return AccessorBasePtr(new AttributeArray::Accessor<ValueType_>(
00977         &TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::get, &TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::set));
00978 }
00979 
00980 
00981 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00982 bool
00983 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::isEqual(const AttributeArray& other) const
00984 {
00985     const TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>* const otherT = dynamic_cast<const TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>* >(&other);
00986     if(!otherT) return false;
00987     if(this->mSize != otherT->mSize ||
00988        this->mIsUniform != otherT->mIsUniform ||
00989        *this->sTypeName != *otherT->sTypeName) return false;
00990 
00991     const StorageType *target = this->mData, *source = otherT->mData;
00992     if (!target && !source) return true;
00993     if (!target || !source) return false;
00994     Index n = this->mIsUniform ? 1 : mSize;
00995     while (n && math::isExactlyEqual(*target++, *source++)) --n;
00996     return n == 0;
00997 }
00998 
01000 
01001 // AttributeHandle implementation
01002 
01003 template <typename T>
01004 AttributeHandle<T>::AttributeHandle(const AttributeArray& array, const bool preserveCompression)
01005     : mArray(&array)
01006 {
01007     // if array is compressed and preserve compression is true, copy and decompress
01008     // into a local copy that is destroyed with handle to maintain thread-safety
01009 
01010     if (array.isCompressed() && preserveCompression) {
01011         mLocalArray = array.copyUncompressed();
01012         mLocalArray->decompress();
01013         mArray = mLocalArray.get();
01014     }
01015 
01016     // bind getter and setter methods
01017 
01018     AttributeArray::AccessorBasePtr accessor = mArray->getAccessor();
01019     assert(accessor);
01020 
01021     AttributeArray::Accessor<T>* typedAccessor = static_cast<AttributeArray::Accessor<T>*>(accessor.get());
01022 
01023     if (!typedAccessor) {
01024         OPENVDB_THROW(RuntimeError, "Cannot bind AttributeHandle due to mis-matching types.");
01025     }
01026 
01027     mGetter = typedAccessor->mGetter;
01028     mSetter = typedAccessor->mSetter;
01029 }
01030 
01031 
01032 template <typename T>
01033 T AttributeHandle<T>::get(Index n) const
01034 {
01035     return mGetter(mArray, n);
01036 }
01037 
01039 
01040 // AttributeWriteHandle implementation
01041 
01042 template <typename T>
01043 AttributeWriteHandle<T>::AttributeWriteHandle(AttributeArray& array)
01044     : AttributeHandle<T>(array, /*preserveCompression = */ false) { }
01045 
01046 template <typename T>
01047 void AttributeWriteHandle<T>::set(Index n, const T& value)
01048 {
01049     this->mSetter(const_cast<AttributeArray*>(this->mArray), n, value);
01050 }
